Crypto Giants Notch Wins in Expensive Quest to Sway U.S. Politics – Without Mentioning Crypto https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/06/26/crypto-giants-notch-wins-in-expense-quest-to-sway-us-politics-without-mentioning-crypto/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source =rss&utm_campaign=头条新闻WIBRNH2BY5A27NWDBCFC6IXPSU Jesse HamiltonIn politics, money talks, but the donors and organizers behind crypto's massive U.S. campaign fund don't. The digital assets industry has amassed a juggernaut of campaign finance, a $169 million fund that's capable of steering many contests this year and could decide the makeup of next year's Congress. It's already scored more than 20 victories, including high-profile elections in California and, just this week, New York.
